About Me

Computer Science Undergraduate

Javascript

With everything moving towards the web, and the introduction of technologies like node.js, Javascript is at the forefront of modern developing. Fortunately for me, it is also my favourite language, and what I spend the majority of my time programming in.

  • Learn More

HTML5

Given that I like to create modern web applications, a knowledge of HTML5 is essential, and is incredibly beneficial in many ways. Linking with CSS3 creates a very powerful environment to develop with, and in turn creates beautiful, simple and clean web applications.
